Label.en: There really are a lot of people in this painting - 132, actually
Label.fr: Il y a vraiment beaucoup de personnages sur cette toile - 132, en fait
Label.es: There really are a lot of people in this painting - 132, actually

Label.en: It meant that Veronese could show off his skills by painting characters in many different poses, sizes, and colours!
Label.fr: Il s'agissait, pour Veronese, de faire étalage de ses talents en peignant des personnages dans beaucoup de poses, tailles et couleurs différentes !
Label.es: It meant that Veronese could show off his skills by painting characters in many different poses, sizes, and colours!

Label.en: You could look at this painting for an hour and still be seeing new stuff!
Label.fr: Tu pourrais regarder cette oeuvre pendant une heure et quand même découvrir de nouveaux éléments !
Label.es: You could look at this painting for an hour and still be seeing new stuff!

Label.en: Actually, this was popular in many paintings from that era!
Label.fr: En fait, c'était populaire dans beaucoup de peintures de cette époque !
Label.es: Actually, this was popular in many paintings from that era!

Label.en: They loved to paint huge, grand crowd scenes with lots of things going on at once!
Label.fr: Ils adoraient peindre d'immenses et grandioses foules avec beaucoup de choses qui se passent en même temps !
Label.es: They loved to paint huge, grand crowd scenes with lots of things going on at once!

Label.en: That trend really suited these monks!
Label.fr: Cette mode convenait parfaitement à ces moines !
Label.es: That trend really suited these monks!

Label.en: It’s perfect for being shown in a dining hall!
Label.fr: C'est parfait pour être affiché dans un réfectoire !
Label.es: It’s perfect for being shown in a dining hall!

Label.en: It really brings it to life and makes the room seem much busier
Label.fr: Ça le rend vivant et donne l'impression que la pièce est bien plus remplie
Label.es: It really brings it to life and makes the room seem much busier

Label.en: Especially since the perspective in the painting would make it seem like it was part of the room!
Label.fr: Surtout dans la mesure où la perspective dans le tableau donne l'impression qu'il fait partie de la pièce !
Label.es: Especially since the perspective in the painting would make it seem like it was part of the room!
